data.criteria: A study was included in this systematic review and meta-analysis if all the following criteria were met: (1) was based on humans; (2) written in the English language; (3) conducted using observational study design—case-control, cohort, and cross-sectional study designs; (4) examined the association between paternal depression and risk of depression in offspring; and (5) estimated the association using odds ratio (OR) or relative risks (RR) or reported data to calculate the effect estimates. Animal studies, reviews, case reports, commentaries, editorials, and meeting or conference abstracts were excluded from the current meta-analysis.
